title: Profiles In Soil Health: "Enhancing Soil Systems Utilizing Grazing Practices" With Steve Reimer

tasks.task: Discussion about family farm heritage and cattle grazing practices.
subtasks: Describe the family's long-standing connection to the farm.
Mention the history of Hereford cattle and their traditions.
Explain past grazing methods using pastures and now smaller "traps."
Discuss current grazing strategies based on available grasses.
Address unpredictability of weather and its impact on farming practices.
Emphasize broad-minded approaches to utilizing byproducts from crops.
Highlight the benefit of cover crops and residue grazing in enhancing the system.
Relate resilience and longevity to soil quality, microbial activity, and profitability.
